item.description:
Every Tuesday this Fall we will meet for drinks (does not have to be beer or alcohol) and some food at a bar or restaurant in Waltham Center. These meetups are a great way to find out about our ski club and meet skiers/ riders before the season gets going. We are all about having fun and sharing good times so this is a perfect introduction to our Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club.

We will have new people attending every week and we are always friendly to first timers. The group will be small, usually between 8 to 12 people and we may grab a table or corner of a bar. Some will also attend our Ski Fitness Training that takes places at Waltham Common at 6:30. Yes, we may be a bit ripe from the workout but it is all about getting ready for the season - it was also make us easy to find, just look for the group in work-out clothes. You do not have to attend the Ski Fitness Training to attend the Beer night.

The actual bar will be chosen a week in advance and posted to this page. All will be in the Waltham Center, Moody Street area.

ps - does anyone have a suggestion for a better name? "Waltham Tuesday Beer Night" just does not convey the true spirit of the gathering. I hope to see you!
item.how_to_find_us: actual Bar will be chosen about 1 week in advance, we will come from our Ski Fitness Training so just look for the groups they looks like they completed an intense workout
item.name: Waltham Tuesday Beer Night
